rooms.name: Open-plan Living and Kitchen Area
rooms.description: A spacious open layout that integrates living space with the kitchen area. The design incorporates bohemian style elements like eclectic furniture, warm color schemes, and artistic d√©cor. Vastu principles are followed by positioning the entrance on the North side to invite positive energy. A central focal point is created using natural light from large windows along the East and West walls.

rooms.name: Master Bedroom
rooms.description: A comfortable master bedroom designed with a bohemian aesthetic that features vibrant textiles, natural wood finishes, and creative lighting fixtures. The room is located on the West side of the house to ensure privacy and good ventilation in accordance with Vastu.

openings.description: Main entrance door positioned on the north wall to enhance positive energy flow. The opening leads directly into the living area.
Secondary entrance on the south side providing access to the bedroom and potential outdoor space.
Large window on the east wall that brings in abundant morning light and enhances the bohemian vibe.
Large window on the west wall to complement the east-facing window and ensure balanced light distribution.
